titleStmt.title: Taisho Tripitaka, Electronic version, No. 1683 犍稚梵讚
titleStmt.author: 宋 法賢譯

availability.p: Available for non-commercial use when distributed with this header intact.

projectDesc.p: Text as provided by Mr. Hsiao Chen-Kuo, Tripitaka Koreana as provided by Mr. Christian Wittern, Text as provided by SAT, Japan, Text as provided by Anonymous, USA
蕭鎮國大德提供，維習安大德提供之高麗藏 CD 經文，日本 SAT 組織提供，北美某大德提供

change.item: Created initial TEI XML version with BASICX.BAT (99/10/12)

juan.jhead: 揵稚＝犍稚【宋】【元】【宮】，犍椎【明】揵稚＝犍稚【宋】【元】【宮】，＝犍椎【明】揵稚犍稚犍椎梵讚

div1.byline:
西天譯經三藏＝宋【明】西天譯經三藏宋朝散大夫試鴻臚＝光祿【宮】鴻臚光祿
